Docs.summary: Represents child controls of containers that support the control pattern.

remarks.format: ## Remarks See [Control Pattern Mapping for UI Automation Clients](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for examples of controls that can implement this control pattern.

## Remarks This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollItemPatternIdentifiers>.
The pattern identifier is passed to methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A> to retrieve the control pattern of interest from the specified <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.

Docs.summary: Scrolls the content area of a container object in order to display the within the visible region (viewport) of the container.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This method does not provide the ability to specify the position of the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> within the visible region (viewport) of the container.
## Examples In the following example, a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern.Select%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern.AddToSelection%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern.RemoveFromSelection%2A> event handler has been declared that attempts to scroll a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern> object into the viewable region of its container control.
